reviews.review_msg: His lectures are very fun to attend. He's very clear and gives a lot of entertaining examples. He sends out outlines of the slides prior to lecture. Likes to cracks jokes from time to time to keep the class awake. Very helpful with the assignments and quite flexible too. Recommend taking a course with Shane!
It's alright, nothing amazing. A lot of people like him because he is relatable, but all around average teacher
